item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 60025) - SS Common: DataFormatter should return TRUE or FALSE for boolean cell values

item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58191) - XSLF: Support merge cells within a table row

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59958) - XSSF: Add cells on the fly to the evaluation sheet cache on cache miss

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 60005) - XSLF: NPE in XSLFTextParagraph.getDefaultFontSize()

item.description: add by POI Developers - Add Apache commons-collections4 dependency

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - XSSFFormulaEvaluator.evaluateAll() should mirror HSSF and use any setup referenced workbooks

item.title: fix(bug 59736)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59736) - SS Common: Incorrect evaluation of SUBTOTAL with composite interval

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 55384) - SXSSF: Handle setting pre-evaluation string correctly in SXSSF as well

item.title: fix(bug 59634)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59634) - POI Overall: Clarify and refine JavaDoc of various close() methods to consistently state that close() invalidates the object

item.title: add(bug 57919)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57919) - HSSF, HSLF and HPSF support for in-place writing to the currently open File (requires the POIFS/NPOIFS was opened from a read-write File)

item.title: add(bug 57919)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57919) - HSSF, HSLF, HPSF and HWPF support for writing out to a new File - normally faster than writing to an OutputStream

item.title: fix(bug 59881)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59881) - SS Common: D* formula evaluation from blank cells in database headers

item.title: add(bug 52122)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 52122) - Excel does not handle conditional formatting based on formula correctly unless recalculation is forced

item.title: add(bug 59106)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 59106) - SS Common: WorkdayFunction does not read the area with holidays correctly to calculate work days

item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58802) - HWPF: Allow reading of footnote and endnote properties

item.title: add(bug 59665)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 59665) - HSSF: Using HSSFWorkbook#setSheetOrder to move sheets to the end corrupts bspos value in WorkbookRecordList
